Apply AST smoothing to residuals

Source: R/ast.R
apply_ast_smoothing.Rd

Core algorithm: combines spatial, temporal, and age weight matrices via Kronecker products, applies coverage weighting, normalizes, and computes weighted average of residuals for each prediction cell.

Usage

apply_ast_smoothing(
  resid_df,
  space_mat,
  time_mat,
  age_mat,
  n_age,
  min_year,
  max_year,
  weight_coverage = 0.9
)

Arguments

resid_df

Data frame with columns: age, year, location, residual, and optionally coverage.

space_mat

Spatial weight matrix.

time_mat

Temporal weight matrix.

age_mat

Age weight matrix.

n_age

Number of age groups.

min_year

Start year.

max_year

End year.

weight_coverage

Coverage weight parameter (default 0.9).

Value

Data frame with columns: year, age, location, residual_AST.
